mapper.insert: insert into enterprise (etp_cd, user_id, etp_addr, etp_ph_no, etp_license_no, etp_nm, etp_content, etp_email, etp_apply_dt) values ('h'||ENTERPRISE_SEQ.nextval, #{user_id},#{etp_addr},#{etp_ph_no}, #{etp_license_no},#{etp_nm}, #{etp_content},#{etp_email}, sysdate)

insert into enterprise (etp_cd, user_id, etp_addr, etp_ph_no, etp_license_no, etp_nm, etp_content, etp_email, etp_apply_dt) VALUES ('f'||ENTERPRISE_SEQ.nextval, #{user_id},#{etp_addr},#{etp_ph_no}, #{etp_license_no},#{etp_nm}, #{etp_content},#{etp_email}, sysdate)
